name: Mine for your life!
description:
"Mine for your life!" is a tower defense game where the player has to build, mine, smelt, and craft resources to create towers for defending against monsters.

In this game, the player creates a chain of reactions to create new components.

We've used playfab to display a leaderboard at the end of the game.

This game was created for Azure Game Jam by : 

 -  Pierre Elloy (pielloy), game dev

 -  Matis Merilain (matismerrylane), sound designer

 -  Nadir Bhanji (), artist

All the assets were made by ourselves except the tilemap.

Update:

 - When the player goes back to the menu the player is no longer stuck inside the login panel.

 - We've fixed the difficulty increment that didn't work like intended.
